metadata.title: CVE-2018-6520 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
SimpleSAMLphp before 1.15.2 allows remote attackers to bypass an open redirect protection mechanism via crafted authority data in a URL.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6520` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

simplesamlphp - 1.15.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15.2-1').
